system.description:
Your studies have allowed you to catch a glimpse, however brief, of the deeper cosmic truths your faith has to offer, broadening your awareness and granting the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Wisdom score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain an additional specialty with religion, and the maximum size for an expertise die on religion checks for you is 1d12.
  • You may spend a hit die or a use of channel divinity to replicate the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.qsa7b22n3y1pbzf6]{Augury} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bs3wnsid88tbup6c]{Divination} spell.  Alternatively you may expend a hit die and a use of channel divinity or either one and inspiration to replicate the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.h5ssew7apf5ofbhc]{Commune} spell.  Similar to scholar abilities, this does not count as actually casting a spell.  After replicating any of the above spells, you may make a DC 25 religion check.  On a success, this replication does not count towards the daily failure chance of the spell in question.  This only applies to replicating a spell through this feat, not if you cast it through any other means.
